alert.note: Alert for Butler; Stoddard; Wayne (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wayne, northeastern Butler and Stoddard Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Williamsville east across Lake Wappapello State Park to northern Stoddard County. The storms were moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dexter, Bloomfield, Lake Wappapello State Park, Puxico, Essex, and Bell City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
